General.Name: Whirlpool China Co Ltd
General.Description: Whirlpool China Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, procurement, production, and sale of kitchen appliances in China and internationally. It offers refrigerators, washing machines, dishwashers, clothes dryers, ovens, micro-steaming and roasting machines, gas stoves, garbage disposers, and other product lines under the Whirlpool and Dido brands. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Hefei, China. Whirlpool China Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Guangdong Galanz Household Appliances Manufacturing Co., Ltd.
